Renter.title: Renter
Renter.description: Represents a registered renter in the e-bike rental system.

firstName.description: The first name of the renter.

lastName.description: The last name of the renter.

email.description: The email address of the renter.

phone.description: The phone number of the renter.

dateJoined.description: The date and time when the renter joined the system.

status.description: The current status of the renter (e.g., active, suspended, deactivated).

Ebike.title: Ebike
Ebike.description: Represents an e-bike unit in the rental system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the e-bike unit.

stationId.description: Reference to Station. The station where the e-bike is currently located. (Relationship: Station 1:N Ebike)

batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the e-bike (percentage).

status.description: The current status of the e-bike (e.g., available, in use, under maintenance, locked).

locked.description: Indicates whether the e-bike is currently locked.

lastMaintenanceDate.description: The date of the e-bike's last maintenance.

Station.title: Station
Station.description: Represents a rental station where e-bikes are located.

id.description: Unique identifier for the rental station.

name.description: The name of the rental station.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the station's location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the station's location.

parkingBays.description: The number of parking bays available at the station.

id.description: Unique identifier for the rental transaction.

renterId.description: Reference to Renter. The renter who initiated the rental. (Relationship: Renter 1:N Rental)

ebikeId.description: Reference to Ebike. The e-bike being rented. (Relationship: Ebike 1:N Rental)

startTime.description: The date and time when the rental started.

endTime.description: The date and time when the rental ended (can be null if the rental is still active).

rentalFee.description: The computed rental fee for the transaction.

status.description: The status of the rental (e.g., active, completed, overdue, paid).

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment made by a renter.

renterId.description: Reference to Renter. The renter who made the payment. (Relationship: Renter 1:N Payment)

rentalId.description: Reference to Rental. The rental for which the payment was made. (Relationship: Rental 1:N Payment)

paymentDate.description: The date and time when the payment was made.

status.description: The status of the payment (e.g., paid, pending, overdue).

MaintenanceIssue.title: MaintenanceIssue
MaintenanceIssue.description: Represents a maintenance issue reported for an e-bike.

id.description: Unique identifier for the maintenance issue.

ebikeId.description: Reference to Ebike. The e-bike for which the issue was reported. (Relationship: Ebike 1:N MaintenanceIssue)

reportDate.description: The date and time when the issue was reported.

description.description: A description of the maintenance issue.

status.description: The status of the maintenance issue (e.g., open, in progress, resolved).

resolutionDate.description: The date and time when the issue was resolved (can be null if the issue is still open).

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification sent to a renter.

renterId.description: Reference to Renter. The renter to whom the notification was sent. (Relationship: Renter 1:N Notification)

sentDate.description: The date and time when the notification was sent.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

type.description: The type of notification (e.g., rental reminder, payment due, announcement).

/renters/{renterId}.description: Stores renter profiles. Uses path-based ownership for related subcollections.

/renters/{renterId}/rentals/{rentalId}.description: Stores rental transactions associated with a specific renter. This enforces path-based ownership.

/renters/{renterId}/payments/{paymentId}.description: Stores payment information associated with a specific renter. Enforces path-based ownership.

/renters/{renterId}/notifications/{notif.description: Stores notifications associated with a specific renter. Enforces path-based ownership.

/rentals/{rentalId}.description: Stores all rental transactions for administrative access.

/payments/{paymentId}.description: Stores all payment transactions for administrative access.

/maintenance_issues/{maintenanceIssueId}.description: Stores maintenance issues reported for e-bikes.
